Detailed Description

GraphicBuffer class. You can draw line,point, or bitmap in a graphic buffer object.

Author:
Baptiste Burles. POB-Technology

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

com.pobtechnology.poblcd.GraphicBuffer.GraphicBuffer ( int  w,
int  h,
boolean  one_bit_per_pixel 
)

Create a new graphic buffer. A graphic buffer is defined by width, heigth and pixel size.

Parameters:
w Width of buffer
h Height of buffer
one_bit_per_pixel Size of pixel in this graphic buffer. Set to true if you want a buffer of one bit per pixel. false for a one byte per pixel buffer.
